properties.name: Ann's Place Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Etradaniel164 Mount Adams Highway, Glenwood, WA, 98619, United StatesLocated in the town of Glenwood only 1 mile down the road from the Flying L ranch, this is a smaller 3 bedroom b&b with 3 rooms: the first room has a queen and a trundel bed that can sleep two, the second room has a double bed, and the thrid room has two twin beds. There is an additional single bed that can be put in the hallway. We would like to help coordinate these rooms as well, as it is good for "spillover" from the Flying L. Please contact us if you are interested in staying here. [~15 miles from wedding site]

properties.name: Brightland Kerr Farm B&B - Place to Stay
properties.description: Posted by EtradanielLocated near the town of Trout Lake, this is a 3 room b&b. We have not reserved any of the rooms. [~4 miles from the wedding site]

properties.name: Flying L Ranch - Place to Stay
properties.description: Posted by Etradaniel25 Flying L Lane, Glenwood, WA 98619Located in the town of Glenwood, this is going to be a major wedding party hold-out. With a series of cabins and rooms in various lodges, kitchens, common spaces, and a large grounds (plus breakfast included), this is going to be a great place to hang out over the weekend. We are coordinating room placement for the Flying L Ranch and are prioritizing family members for this location. Right now we have mostly filled the Flying L to capacity, but please contact us if you are interested in staying here as we are still working out some wrinkles. [~14 miles from wedding site]

properties.name: Rafting Rendevous
properties.description: Posted by EtradanielWe meet at the take out which is 5 miles north of Washington Highway 14 just off highway 141 at Northwestern Lake. If lost or late call (800) 909-7238. To reach the rendezvous take I-84 to exit 64 in Hood River, cross over the Bridge (north), it costs 75 cents, and turn left (west) on Hwy 14. Go 1.6 miles and turn right on highway 141ALT. Go 2.2 miles to a stop sign and turn left (north) on highway 141. Go 2.0 miles to Northwestern Lake Rd and turn left. The Park is 0.4 mile down the hill on the left just after crossing the river. Turn into the parking area and look for the All Star Van/bus. Allow 1.5 hour travel time from downtown Portland or 1 hour from Government Camp or 15 minutes from Hood River.

properties.name: Serenity's Chalet Cabins - Place to Stay
properties.description: Posted by EtradanielLocated in the town of Trout Lake, this chalet has 4 great looking cabins! We have not yet placed a hold on any of these cabins. [~3 miles from the wedding site]

properties.name: Trout Lake House - Place to Stay

properties.name: Trout Lake Motel - Place to Stay
properties.description: Posted by Etradaniel 2300 Highway 141, Trout Lake, WALocated in the town of Trout Lake, this motel is said to be run by some lovely people. It has 12 units including 8 rooms with 2 queens (one of them is handicap accessible) and 5 rooms with 1 queen. All of the rooms are on hold under the Waichunas-Etra party until July 25th. Please contact them directly to reserve a room. [~3 miles from wedding site]
